trail-settings.name: Trail Settings
trail-settings.description: These, well... allows you to change the trail parameters to your liking.

fade-time.name: Fade Time
fade-time.description: Duration for the fade effect (in seconds). This is also the trail length until I properly work on it.

trail-width.name: Trail Width
trail-width.description: Width of the trail. Currently doesn't work properly

trail-opacity.name: Trail Opacity
trail-opacity.description: Opacity of the trail (0 = transparent, 255 = opaque).

disable-blending.name: Disable Blending (Experimental)
disable-blending.description: Attempts to disable blending by changing the blending algorithm.

stripe-colors.name: (Custom) Stripe Colors
stripe-colors.description: A list of colors for the trail, maximum 7.
stripe-colors.enable-if-description: Set the preset as custom first.

debugging.name: Developer Options
debugging.description: These are provided for debugging. Only change these if you know what you're doing.

min-seg.name: Minimum Segment Length
min-seg.description: Minimum distance between points in the trail. You probably do not need to change this.

max-seg.name: Maximum Segment Length
max-seg.description: Maximum distance between points in the trail. Again, you probably do not need to change this.
